item.title: Add selectstar.com
item.description: https://www.selectstar.com/ - - is an intelligent data discovery platform that automatically analyzes and documents your data. Free light tier with 1 Data Source, up to 100 Tables and up to 10 Users.

item.title: Specify Gather free tier limit
item.description: https://www.gather.town/ - A better way to meet online. Centered around fully customizable spaces, Gather makes spending time with your communities just as easy as real life. Free for up to 25 concurrent users.
